# 设计模式精解－GoF 23种设计模式解析附C++实现源码

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shejimoshi-jingjie-gof-23-zhong-shejimoshi-jiexi-fu-c-shixian-yuanma
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shejimoshi-jingjie-gof-23-zhong-shejimoshi-jiexi-fu-c-shixian-yuanma
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shejimoshi-jingjie-gof-23-zhong-shejimoshi-jiexi-fu-c-shixian-yuanma
shejimoshi-jingjie-gof-23-zhong-shejimoshi-jiexi-fu-c-shixian-yuanma <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shejimoshi-jingjie-gof-ersan-zhong-shejimoshi-jiexi-fu-c-shixian-yuanma
shejimoshi-jingjie-gof-ersan-zhong-shejimoshi-jiexi-fu-c-shixian-yuanma <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
